education_text.0: Bahl began his professional career in 1988 as an engineer in the image processing research group at      Digital Equipment Corporation Digital Equipment Corporation in      Maynard, Massachusetts Maynard, MassachusettsOver the past 20 years, Bahl has been a keystone figure in the mobile computing research community, beginning with his 1995 founding (with      Imrich Chlamtac Imrich Chlamtac) of      Association for Computing Machinery ACM      SIGMOBILE, the ACM's special interest group in mobility and tetherless ubiquitous connectivity
